Title: Cost of the Living: A Zom Rom Com
Writer: Ted Marr (additional material), An Shaughnessy (additional material), Michael Skeldon (story), Daniel Lee White (story), Daniel Lee White
Actors: Kevin Killavey, Sarah Nicklin, Gio Castellano, Samantha Acampora
Plot: It is a live action feature film that is set in a world where the undead have risen and can be tamed to live peacefully with humans. People have been split between those who support undead ...
